caption: Amedeo Modigliani (1884–1920; born Livorno, Italy; died Paris, France), Portrait of Woman in a Large Hat, ca. 1918–19. Graphite with touches of blue crayon on thin cream wove paper,  with rounded corners, and perforations of sketchbook page at right edge, backed with Japanese paper; 49 × 30.4 cm. Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-1062)
